title: MD
biography:
Steven R. Cummings is an American epidemiologist and Emeritus Professor of Medicine, Epidemiology and Biostatistics at the University of California San Francisco.
He is one of the top highly cited researchers (h>100) according to webometrics.
aiSummary: Steven R. Cummings is a osteoporosis specialist with an H-index of 174 at University of California, San Francisco (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, JAMA. Based in United States.
